sentences.sentence: According to the theory of game and information economics, the paper sets up a two-staged basic model, and gives conditions of disinvestment.
sentences.translation: 本文利用博弈论和信息经济学的理论知识，通过建立一个两阶段基本模型，给出了风险企业的退出条件。
